Automatically saves all edits every 2 seconds to prevent data loss in case of unexpected application termination.

Provides a contextual menu for automatic string resource extraction from source code. Streamlines localization by moving hardcoded text directly into `strings.xml`. Compatible with Kotlin, Java, and XML files.

Whether the editor should delete empty lines on a single backspace key event.
When enabled, the editor will delete spaces equal to the tab width when the backspace key is pressed.

üö® Important Notice

This AI agent is designed to assist you in developing Android applications directly within the Android Code Studio environment. While it strives for accuracy, please be aware that AI can sometimes generate code with errors, suggest outdated practices, or misinterpret complex requirements.

‚úÖ To get the best results, please follow these guidelines:
‚Ä¢ üìù Be Specific: Clearly state your goal (e.g., "Add a button that opens a new activity").
‚Ä¢ üß† Provide Context: Include relevant code snippets, error messages, or logcat outputs.
‚Ä¢ üö´ Avoid Greetings: Please do not start your message with greetings like "hi", "hello", or "hey". Instead, go straight to your request to help the AI respond faster and more accurately.
‚Ä¢ üõ†Ô∏è Important: Always ensure to open your files in the code editor so that in case of a bad or corrupted response, you can easily undo the changes.
‚Ä¢ üîÑ Reset Context After Success: When you\'re done with a request and it matches your needs, long press the send message button and perform a hard reset of the context. This helps start fresh and prevents the AI from getting stuck on previous requests.

‚ö° Always carefully review and test all generated code before building your project.

*Tip: Long press the send message button to manage AI context.
The application needs to restart to apply changes. Do you want to restart now?
Allows this application to bind to Android Code Studio\'s logging service. This permission is required for Android Code Studio to read logs of this application.

Help me improve Android Code Studio by providing anonymous statistics. I collect basic information about your device for user base statistics only. The exact data that is shared can be viewed in preferences. Your data is secure and not shared with third-party services. You can opt-out anytime in preferences.
